entities.name: the unforgivable curses
entities.description: The Unforgivable Curses are a group of powerful and forbidden spells that were introduced by Moody. They are mentioned as being used by Voldemort in the past.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is a wizard who is teaching Harry about the Unforgivable Curses. He is described as being serious and intimidating.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a dark wizard who was mentioned by Moody as having used the Unforgivable Curses in the past.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is being taught by Moody. He is described as knowing what Moody is talking about.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and classmate. He is described as shuddering at Moody's words.
